Reviews.Title: 4/5 Stars for Overall Quality of Package
Reviews.Author: Marcus Knipp
Reviews.Content: All of the items are brand new and in the box.  The only complain  have is the camera bag and the tripod.  The tripod is junk and dangerous to use with any DSLR camera.  The bag is small and not enough space for what is needed.  All of the extras except the telephoto lens and the camera are all off brand items, but work just fine.  I recommend this setup as you get all you need.  Just buy a good tripod and a good camera bag for your nice new shiny camera.  Good luck

Reviews.Title: best deal ever
Reviews.Author: trencha davis
Reviews.Content: This was the best deal ever.  I use the camera for an event  the picture came out great.  I'm looking forward to taken more picture

Reviews.Title: Perfect for starters or pros.....
Reviews.Author: chichigirl51
Reviews.Content: Fantastic product!!! Exactly what I was looking for!! I'm an amateur photographer trying to cross over into professional and this camera is making my journey soooooooo easy!!! LOVE IT!!!!
